LanguageData.Moyo_FarmChild.title: moyo farm child
LanguageData.Moyo_FarmChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a seaweed farm in the upper levels. Amidst the rumors and the worried adults [PAWN_pronoun] spent her time tending and harvesting the seaweed.
LanguageData.Moyo_Orphan.title: moyo Orphan
LanguageData.Moyo_Orphan.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was separated from her parents and grew up in the orphanage. There were many orphans like [PAWN_pronoun]in the orphanage, and some had even seen their parents die before their eyes. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days waiting for her parents to return.
LanguageData.Moyo_MechanicWannabe.title: moyo mechanic wannabe
LanguageData.Moyo_MechanicWannabe.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had a fascination for various machines and gadgets. Luckily for [PAWN_pronoun] the sea was filled with scrap and parts for her to play with.
LanguageData.Moyo_Dreamer.title: moyo dreamer
LanguageData.Moyo_Dreamer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to fantasize about the city shimmering in the depths below. The adults warned [PAWN_pronoun] away from the lower levels, telling [PAWN_objective] it was dangerous and that’d [PAWN_pronoun]’d never make it back, but could not change [PAWN_possessive] mind
LanguageData.Moyo_Bully.title: moyo bully
LanguageData.Moyo_Bully.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] learned the sweet taste of dominance from an early age. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed bullying other kids and stealing their things. The orphanage children where often [PAWN_possessive] victims.
LanguageData.Moyo_PettyTheif.title: moyo petty theif
LanguageData.Moyo_PettyTheif.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] suffered from the civil war. [PAWN_possessive] family was left ravaged, and [PAWN_nameDef] scraped by as a petty thief.
LanguageData.Moyo_HuntingAssistant.title: moyo hunting assistant
LanguageData.Moyo_HuntingAssistant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] followed hunters and did odd jobs for them. [PAWN_pronoun] was able to learn about the surrounding fauna and sometimes even do a little hunting [PAWN_objective]self.
LanguageData.Moyo_CoralSculpter.title: moyo coral sculpter
LanguageData.Moyo_CoralSculpter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] learned to fashion jewelry out of coral. [PAWN_possessive] works were not the most refined, but showed promise.
LanguageData.Moyo_BrightChild.title: moyo bright child
LanguageData.Moyo_BrightChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a clever child. [PAWN_possessive] preference for study over socializing occasionally led to some falling out with other children, but in the end, it’s the ones like [PAWN_possessive] who can move to higher levels.
LanguageData.Moyo_WhaleFriend.title: moyo whale friend
LanguageData.Moyo_WhaleFriend.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loved to swim with the whales. [PAWN_pronoun] always spent [PAWN_possessive] free time swimming with the whales and taking care of them.
LanguageData.Moyo_ChildChef.title: moyo child chef
LanguageData.Moyo_ChildChef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loved to cook. Mixing various spices and ingredients into tasty dishes was [PAWN_possesive] favorite pastime, but as supplies dwindled, it became harder and harder to enjoy.
LanguageData.Moyo_YoungJunkie.title: moyo young junkie
LanguageData.Moyo_YoungJunkie.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] somehow managed to get [PAWN_possessive] hands on some psychite. The euphoric high of the drugs was too much for [Pawn_possessive] young mind, and soon [PAWN_nameDef] was doing anything [PAWN_pronoun] could for [PAWN_possessive] next fix. Soon [PAWN_possessive] normal fix could no longer satisfy [PAWN_possessive], and [PAWN_nameDef] sought out new drugs.
LanguageData.Moyo_SicklyChild.title: moyo sickly child
LanguageData.Moyo_SicklyChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born sickly, and spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time in bed. [PAWN_possessive] constant sickness left [PAWN_objective] ill tempered, and long with her lack of interaction with other moyos, resulted in her poor communication skills. The only retreat [PAWN_possessive] has was the pursuit of knowledge.
LanguageData.Moyo_SmugglerRunner.title: moyo smuggler runner
LanguageData.Moyo_SmugglerRunner.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] did odd jobs for smugglers. Having joined to earn money [PAWN_pronoun] mostly dealt with moving goods and information around. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly learned to leverage [PAWN_possessive] young looks for [PAWN_possessive] job.
LanguageData.Moyo_YoungMiner.title: moyo young miner
LanguageData.Moyo_YoungMiner.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] became a miner to earn money for [PAWN_possessive] family. [PAWN_nameDef]’s dreams and aspirations meant nothing as a miner. The only thing that mattered was bringing in more ores for the lighthouse.
LanguageData.Moyo_ChildSoldier.title: moyo child soldier
LanguageData.Moyo_ChildSoldier.baseDescription: While other children where given toys [PAWN_nameDef] was handed a gun. Kidnapped and sent to fight in the civil war, [PAWN_pronoun] learned it was kill or be killed out in the battlefield, and fought only to survive.
LanguageData.Moyo_HighbonChild.title: moyo highborn child
LanguageData.Moyo_HighbonChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a highborn moyo from the lower levels. Housework was done by the servants, and all [PAWN_pronoun] had to do was enjoy [PAWN_possessive] live. Neither the civil war, nor the moyo that died in it where any of [PAWN_possessive] concern. Probably.
LanguageData.Moyo_YoungCelebrity.title: moyo young celebrity
LanguageData.Moyo_YoungCelebrity.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was famed for [PAWN_possessive] singing, dancing, acting, any many more besides. Countless moyo living in the city idolized [PAWN_nameDef]. There were many rumors about how [PAWN_nameDef] became so famous at such a young age, but only [PAWN_nameDef] would know the truth.
LanguageData.Moyo_ShockedNurse.title: moyo shocked nurse
LanguageData.Moyo_ShockedNurse.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was conscripted as a nurse to deal with manpower shortages in the hospital. While [PAWN_pronoun] normally tended to light wounds, [PAWN_pronoun] had to deal with serious wounds as well. The work was taxing on [PAWN_nameDef], both physically and mentally.
LanguageData.Moyo_EngineeringStudent.title: moyo engineering student
LanguageData.Moyo_EngineeringStudent.baseDescription: The expansion and construction of the lighthouse is no trivial matter, and city engineers are often trained from a young age. [PAWN_nameDef] studied many blueprints as [PAWN_pronoun] prepared to become a engineer.
LanguageData.Moyo_VatgrownSoldier.title: moyo vatgrown soldier
LanguageData.Moyo_VatgrownSoldier.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was not a result of love nor lust. [PAWN_pronoun] was grown in a vat, assigned a number, and sent to a facility in the lower levels for military training. More used to her number than the name given on her graduation, [PAWN_pronoun] is the product of the lighthouse’s bloody reality.
LanguageData.Moyo_Farmer.title: moyo farmer
LanguageData.Moyo_Farmer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a farmer on the upper levels growing food and fiber in the lush kelp farms. Although idealistic at first glance, the thick kelp gave plenty of cover to potential trespassers, was a constant source of headaches for [PAWN_nameDef].
LanguageData.Moyo_FactoryWorker.title: moyo factory worker
LanguageData.Moyo_FactoryWorker.baseDescription: The middle levels of the lighthouse are a source of constant light and heat in the cold ocean depths. [PAWN_nameDef] worked in the factories on the middle level, producing all sorts of gear and products. [PAWN_possessive] most recent job was producing firearms.
LanguageData.Moyo_MechanoidMaintainer.title: moyo mechanoid maintainer
LanguageData.Moyo_MechanoidMaintainer.baseDescription: Mechanoids are the foundations of moyo cities. [PAWN_nameDef] job was the to maintain the aging mechanoids as best [PAWN_pronoun] could. The centuries old but still functioning mechanoids made [PAWN_nameDef] realize how frail the flesh was.
LanguageData.Moyo_Engineer.title: moyo engineer
LanguageData.Moyo_Engineer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the engineers in charge of R&D. [PAWN_pronoun] a part of the firearms development, helping in the testing and creation of many prototypes. No one questioned what effects such a creation would have.
LanguageData.Moyo_Hunter.title: moyo hunter
LanguageData.Moyo_Hunter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] wandered the seas hunting or capturing marine creatures. [PAWN_possessive] mainly brought back meat, luxury items, or rare animals. When dangerous creatures threatened the lighthouse, [PAWN_pronoun] was drafted by the council to aid in repelling the beast.
LanguageData.Moyo_Smuggler.title: moyo smuggler
LanguageData.Moyo_Smuggler.baseDescription: The surface is full of treasures. [PAWN_nameDef] brought those treasures to the lighthouse. The council forbade all unauthorized trading with the surface, but for [PAWN_nameDef], the money brought in by the goods where more important than the law, and [PAWN_pronoun] continued to sneak out to the surface.
LanguageData.Moyo_Soldier.title: moyo soldier
LanguageData.Moyo_Soldier.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a professional soldier, tasked with maintaining order within the lighthouse and fighting off attacking creatures. But as smugglers rose in numbers and civil unrest grew, a civil war broke out and [PAWN_pronoun] had to fight other moyos.
LanguageData.Moyo_DeepCoreMiner.title: moyo deep core miner
LanguageData.Moyo_DeepCoreMiner.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a miner who gathers ore from the core. Equipped with a heavy duty diving suit, deep core mining is a relatively new job that appeared as operating mechanoids became less and less feasible, and became one of the main reasons for moving between levels.
LanguageData.Moyo_Geologist.title: moyo geologist
LanguageData.Moyo_Geologist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]’s job is to survey and study the ocean floor. [PAWN_possessive] job meant spending many hours in the submarine with her team, and [PAWN_pronoun] had to get accustomed to a lot of things.
LanguageData.Moyo_SurfaceTrader.title: moyo surface trader
LanguageData.Moyo_SurfaceTrader.baseDescription: Trade between the surface and the lighthouse is strictly regulated by the council and official traders like [PAWN_nameDef]. As most of the goods from the surface where considered luxury items [PAWN_pronoun] was able to reap massive profits. [PAWN_pronoun] was ruthless in suppressing smugglers that threatened her trade, and personally took care of some as well.
LanguageData.Moyo_Biologist.title: moyo biologist
LanguageData.Moyo_Biologist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]’s research was about the modifications that made the moyo race. This into the ‘evolution’ of the moyo allowed [PAWN_objective] and [PAWN_possessive] team to discover deepblue, a discovery that had far-reaching effects in the moyo society.
LanguageData.Moyo_KindOrphanageMaster.title: moyo orphanage master
LanguageData.Moyo_KindOrphanageMaster.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] took care of orphans separated from their parents. [PAWN_pronoun] worked hard to reunite the children with their parents, or teach them so they could be proud members of society. No one knows why [PAWN_pronoun] started this job, but assume it has something to do with [PAWN_possessive] personal experiences.
LanguageData.Moyo_EvilOrphanageMaster.title: moyo orphanage master
LanguageData.Moyo_EvilOrphanageMaster.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] took care of orphans separated from their parents. [PAWN_pronoun] taught the children that the outside was dangerous, and abandoned children would be hunted. After all, the children where precious resources both for the lighthouse and for [PAWN_possessive].
LanguageData.Moyo_Servant.title: moyo servant
LanguageData.Moyo_Servant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a servant for rich moyos. [PAWN_pronoun] took care of everything from cleaning to cooking, to any special requests [PAWN_possessive] masters might have. Unable to deal with the ever more demanding requests, [PAWN_pronoun] disappeared one day, leaving only a dead body behind.
LanguageData.Moyo_CocktailMixer.title: moyo cocktail mixer
LanguageData.Moyo_CocktailMixer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] experimented mixing surface drugs with deepblue to make new substances. Usually made with psychite, [PAWN_possessive] chemical cocktails where a big hit, both in the lighthouse and on the surface.
LanguageData.Moyo_HydroponicsFarmer.title: moyo hydroponics farmer
LanguageData.Moyo_HydroponicsFarmer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew surface crops in a hydroponics system. [PAWN_pronoun] was unable to sell [PAWN_possessive] produce for the full price, and occasionally faced hardships from the moyos who traded in surface goods. In the light of things, [PAWN_nameDef] set [PAWN_possessive] sights on obtaining a farm on the surface.
LanguageData.Moyo_SurfaceArtist.title: moyo surface artist
LanguageData.Moyo_SurfaceArtist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] made artwork based on scenery from the surface. [PAWN_pronoun] never saw the surface [PAWN_objective]self, nor did [PAWN_pronoun] have much material on it. The artwork of the surface [PAWN_pronoun] created were based almost solely on her imagination and quite fantastical. [PAWN_pronoun] never faced much problems, as [PAWN_possessive] had never seen the surface either.
LanguageData.Moyo_Siren.title: moyo Siren
LanguageData.Moyo_Siren.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was known throughout the entire lower level. With her beautiful looks and voice, [PAWN_nameDef] made [PAWN_possessive] way through the lighthouse’s high society. The moyo gave [PAWN_nameDef] the name Siren in reverence to [PAWN_possessive] beauty.
LanguageData.Moyo_Hitman.title: moyo hitman
LanguageData.Moyo_Hitman.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a gun for hire. Someone is bound to need some dirt work done for them, and that is [PAWN_nameDef]’s specialty. What happened between the client and target doesn’t matter. What matters is that [PAWN_pronoun] gets payed.
LanguageData.Moyo_GuardianStory.title: moyo royalGuard
LanguageData.Moyo_GuardianStory.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the royal guard, trained to be absolute loyalty towards the three elders. As to why or how a member of the royal guard has ended up here, only [PAWN_nameDef] and the elders will know.
